name: Colorblind (polarpenguin17)
description:
You're a member of a peaceful race of magical race of Eyeballs, who lived happily in harmony. Until the fire nation attacked, Lol Kidding. A wizard wanted a part of your power so he split you into three eyeballs each sees only one color and kidnapped the green eyeball. Now, your other parts have to collaborate to reach the wizard's palace and reunite with your missing part and become whole again

You can play alone but what's the point

GRAB A FRIEND

I didn't have fun testing it cause I DID IT ALONE

Controls:

Blue Eye: Up, Down, Left, Right, Z

Red Eye: W, S, A, D, K

to exit a level press Escape

Press again on main menu to close the game

Pixel UI pack

by Kenney Vleugels for Kenney (www.kenney.nl)

with help by Lynn Evers (Twitter: @EversLynn)

Hit Effect by Buch

https://opengameart.org/users/buch
